description: Nothing says summer entertaining like easy barbecued prawn skewers drizzled in currant sauce with a refreshing, seasonal nectarine salad.
keywords: Barbecued Prawn Skewers With Nectarine Salad
name: Barbecued Prawn Skewers With Nectarine Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 kg large thawed green banana prawns

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a greased barbecue plate or grill to high. Cook prawns for 2 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Place skewers on top of nectarine salad. Drizzle with currant sauce to serve.
